predicate.note: Frames file for 'win' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'gain'

roleset.name: win

example.name: win a prize
example.text: The PLO failed earlier this year *trace* to win membership in the World Health Organization and the World Tourism Organization.
example.arg: membership in the World Health Organization and the World Tourism Organization

example.name: win a contest
example.text: Wall Street's old guard seems *trace* to be winning the program-trading battle.

roleset.note: Yes, I know "win a race" and "win a prize" are very different senses--but they take the same syntax!
